summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Fiftieth Street from 15th Avenue N.W. to 17th Avenue N.W. in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 16799, creating Local Improvement District No. 1576 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
